name: Hard to Get Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Fruity Florals..Key Notes: Citron Zest, Sheer Jasmine, Whipped Vanilla..Fragrance Description: This beautifully bright fragrance opens with a burst of vibrant lemon zest that intertwines with the floral notes of jasmine, adding a touch of elegant sophistication. As the scent evolves, it reveals a heart of fluffy, whipped vanilla, which imparts a creamy, airy softness. The composition is rounded off with a rich layer of smooth vanilla, creating a sparkling, irresistibly sweet fragrance that's as enchanting as the person who wears it...About the Fragrance: This radiant scent is crafted for those who are both delightfully elusive and effortlessly lovable. After years of collaboration with top perfumers, the FORVR Mood Fine Fragrances collection is finally here. Discover four unique and unforgettable fragrances, each meticulously designed to match any mood—from sweet and approachable to confidently bold. Perfect for every personality, every day, and every occasion...About the Bottle: Self-care isn’t selfish. It’s a love letter to yourself that you write every day, sealed with a spray of your perfume. Like a precious diamond, these four fine fragrances reflect every one of your facets, from flirty and feminine to bold and unapologetic. These fragrances are encased in a stunning bottle reminiscent of Jackie’s engagement ring, and inspired by the brilliance of diamonds and the allure of precious gems.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_text: I’m really picky about dessert or gourmand scents but I still enjoy wearing this. That’s probably because this has a little more going on than just sugar and sweetness. Like other reviewers say it definitely smells like a lemon cupcake, but the citrus and floral notes help to balance it out. That being said it’s still very much a dessert scent so if that’s not your thing, then this probably isn’t for you. Besides the scent profile the best part about this fragrance is the lasting power—I can still smell it in my hair three days later, which is why I came on here to write a review. I’ve also tried You Remind Me and this one is my favorite of the two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by saying I loved this perfume and think it smells beautiful. The packaging is so elegant and versatile and the color of the perfume itself is light so it doesn’t stain or tint anything. It also sprays really well and does not come out in thick lines or drops. It is a little more floral on me than it is on a tester card which I didn’t love quite as much but I have noticed it smells beautiful on other people so I think that just may be my body chemistry. The only real issue I have is how long it lasts. It lasts about 2-3 hours on me which isn’t terrible but for being a higher end perfume, I would hope it would last a bit longer. For the price though I don’t mind reapplying throughout the day so overall this is a great pick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, so much, its my favorite. Perfumes are an exquisite blend of art and science, designed to evoke emotions and memories. A well-crafted fragrance can transport you to different places and times, making it a powerful accessory in anyone's collection.At the heart of every perfume lies its composition, which typically includes top, middle, and base notes. The top notes are what you smell immediately upon application; they are usually fresh and vibrant, such as citrus or herbal scents. As the fragrance settles, the middle notes emerge, often floral or fruity, providing the character of the perfume. Finally, the base notes, which include deeper, richer elements like woods or musks, create a lasting impression.The versatility of perfumes is another remarkable aspect. Whether you're looking for something light and refreshing for daytime wear or a deep, sensual scent for evening occasions, there's a fragrance to suit every mood and moment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

The longevity is impressive, lasting throughout the day without fading. I've received countless compliments and can't get enough of its seductive aroma. FORVR Mood has mastered the art of creating a scent that's both timeless and trendy – Hard to Get is truly irresistible!

reviews.review_text: After I sampled the new Kayali Lemom Sugar (Capri in a bottle), & actually read that someone compared these two, only then I realized how similar Kayali Lemon Sugar is to HardToGet perfume. Now Hard to Get has more to it, an oomph (extra note that gives it an airy and slightly leathery feel through the top to the bottom notes, like a dimension!) that the Kayali one doesn't have; also I prefer  Hard to Get because the Kayali one turns to skin scent 10 minutes later and the lemon sugar notes disappear. Because it's a hype, I am not risking letting it sit forever to find out if it will ever perform or not, even for a small bottle (not worth it). I like this perfume (Hard to Get) and also like her pink bottle (I am Her?) and I stand behind the scent of Hard to Get. It doesn't last as long as I would like it to (which is all day) but it lasts at least a half day for me; but I'm willing to let it sit and see if it will get better with time.

reviews.review_title: No detectable fruity citrus notes as described =

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent brought me right back to childhood! It smells of warm vanilla. I have the cute little travel spray, so I can freshen up any time, it's easy to bring with you! Although you won't really need it, because the scent it long lasting. complimentary from forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am really annoyed by the number of incentivized reviews, so I want to provide an accurate one.    I purchased all 4 of the travel sprays during the Rouge sale. They were in and out of stock online - I initially bought two online for in-store pickup, then found the other two in-store when I went to get my order and purchased them while I was there.   Let me just say that my taste in perfume and my collection is very heavily vanilla based. I am admittedly a fan of ForvrMood. Jackie has said that her taste leans heavily towards gourmand scents, and I love the scent of a lot of the candles, so I had very high expectations.   BUT- an influencer is an influencer, so I started with the travel sizes just so I wouldn’t be out a couple hundred just to be disappointed.  And yet, I am disappointed. The fragrances are cute but give off a less mature B&BW or VS body spray vibe vs what I expected from a grown EDP launch. There is little to no projection. And the longevity is about non-existent. I tried each one during the day and overnight and the results are the same.   My order for favorites: 1. Hard to Get 2. I Am Her 3. NDA 4. You Remind Me  NDA could be great in the colder weather if it lasted. These were really just OKAY. I would probably only repurchase Hard to Get in the travel size only. The reviews seem overhyped, so I just wanted to give an honest perspective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good citrus scent, it’s definitely in league with Love Don’t Be Shy just a little sweeter and just as potent. The winner of the entire bunch

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Vanilla Pound Cake Whipped Lemon Cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

I was gifted the Hard To Get travel size I have used it from the time I received it and I still have alot left! I cant stop sniffing it on me. Im horrible at explaining perfume notes but plan and simple it reminds me if vanilla cake with lemon whipped cream. I will say it is not a beast scent but it is a beautiful fragrance I get about 3-4 hours before I dont smell it on me as much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite out of them all. Is different and makes u feel like money when wearing it

reviews.review_text: Smells so good !! Honestly one of my new favourite fragrances. The scent isn’t overly powering, but it also doesn’t wear off too soon. It’s the perfect balance. The bottle itself also feels luxurious. 10/10 . Gifted by Forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I was gifted by frvr mood* I have never tried this brand before, but wow😍 this fragrance is unlike any other fragrance I’ve tried before. I know it’s a very light/citrusy scent, but I have really enjoyed wearing it on night outs as it’s super sexy/sultry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a gourmand fan at all, but I love this. I really prefer white florals. I tested all 4 and immediately looked to see what this one was. I love this. It is SWEET, but not in a heavy or caramel way. The scent is soft but silage and lasting power is strong, 5 hours since I put it on and I can still smell it on me. The citron isn't too strong on me, it doesn't smell citrusy, it compliments the other notes instead. The scent is simple and well blended, I can smell the quality of the perfume itself. The jasmine and vanilla don't compete but blend, the citron supports but doesn't overwhelm. The citron instead makes it lighter than what I usually think of a gourmand to be. On me it doesn't smell like cake or dessert specifically, but it is VERY sweet. I've been looking for something that's sweet without the heaviness of caramel or praline, happy to have found this to fill that space.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Hard to get perfume gifted by Forvr Mood. I love the packaging and the gorgeous and unique shape of the bottle. The words written in box were beautiful and I loved opening it. The scent is strong, a little goes a long way. It has hints of jasmine mixed with vanilla, I smelled sweet and citrusy after spraying it on me. I think it will make a great gift and it looks absolutely stunning on my vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t stop sniffing myself when i wear this. It smells like a lemony cake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sweet, creamy gourmand fragrance that dries to a yummy lemon pound cake scent on my skin. To be honest, I was not initially  in love with the top notes. After first spraying, it was like a cloud of jasmine and lemon— not bad, just not distinct or the finessed scent I wanted. However, once this dried and settled on my skin, it became softer, creamier, definitely yummier. Lemon-vanilla pound cake is a good description. Sweet, but not sticky sweet or too tangy. A good close to the skin scent that has a long trail and keeps you smiling when you sniff your wrist. (Gifted by FORVR Mood)

Smells so much like a lemon pastry instead of lemon cleaner. If Crumbl's lemon glaze cookie was a fragrance it would be exactly this!! Very yummy perfect for Spring scent. This fragrance is on the lighter side but that's exactly why I love it. Lasted 6 hours on me which I don't mind reapplying fragrance so that's not a deal breaker for me. Definitely recommend to any vanilla lovers.

reviews.review_text: This perfume smells nice! I very much get the citrus (lemon) and sweet (whipped cream) notes. It reminds me of a lemon dessert. The scent doesn’t last a long time on me but to me that’s not bad, I like that it’s not overpowering. Gifted by forevrmood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow wow wow ! Jackie did her thing with this fragrance line ! This smells sooo good even the bottle looks so expensive and pretty . Very sweet like cotton candy . The vanilla notes are so potent . I wore a few spray before work and freshened up after and still smelled it ! I got my coworkers asking what’s the link to the perfumes sis lol I Loved it #giftedbyforvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this fragrance! It definitely has a strong jasmine note (one of my favorite florals) but then a brighter citrus and sweet note. This is a perfect spring / summer scent, it really brightens my mood and is a drop sweet without being overwhelming. Gifted by forevr mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Forvr Mood. Hard To Get smells delicious! In my opinion it’s vanilla and fruity scented. It’s sweet and a perfect everyday scent for spring and summer. The scent lasts a good amount of time too. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore sugary sweet fragrances, and this one is lovely! It has the vanilla sugary scent in the beginning, then it tones down and the jasmine really shines. Throughout the day it gets less sweet and more floraly! I was gifted by Forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is very sweet! I think its best for layering or if you are into sweet smells! It had a hint of citrus and vanilla - which is amazing. I am more into unisex scents, like tobacco or ouds. But, it pairs really well when layering to make another perfume more feminine! I love it. Gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a truly sweet fragrance with some floral notes and prominent vanilla heart. I personally would like it better if it was more citrusy. Sadly the lemon note is barely noticeable in this composition. So don’t expect it to smell fresh and zesty. You’ll probably love it though if you’re into sweet vanilla fragrances. I received this perfume complimentary from Forvrmood in exchange for my honest opinion on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by forvrmood . I think this was made in my name! Is the exact scent that I always look for in a perfume. With notes of sweetness, freshness, creamy, almost like a puffy and really comforting delicious lemon pie with long lasting sweetness on my body, I think this perfume has become one of the best ones I have right now! Since my PH definitely goes with sweet scents, this perfume makes me leave a trail of the scent and people have asked what perfume is it. And this is a so special gifted product! Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: *gifted by forvrmood* As a perfume collector, I can say that this is a safe blind buy! If the base notes appeal to you, you’ll love this. It’s not a heavy gourmand, but I think it’s perfect for the spring time. If you get the full bottle, I don’t think you’ll regret it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i was so excited for the launch of these perfumes, and this one did not disappoint! i love sweet citrus-y scents, so this was right up my alley. it's subtle and not overpowering,  but makes a statement. i can't wait to try the other perfumes! gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by forvr mood in exchange for my honest feedback. I think the description of this fragrance is spot on, you get the citrus notes but also the vanilla and it’s such a beautiful combination. This is the perfect spring time scent in my opinion, but personally it doesn’t last as long as I’d like. Maybe I need to mix it with different body care products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the perfume comes in very luxurious glass packaging, looks super chic and would make for a great gift! the notes have multiple scents, but all i can really smell is vanilla, the scent is also quite strong and therefore long lasting. if you’re a vanilla fan, this is for you. gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This scent gifted by forvrmood is absolutely intoxicating in the best way. It’s fresh, fruity, flirty, and sexy. It smells like champagne and lemon cupcakes topped with whipped cream. It’s sparkling yet sensual and completely irresistible. I’m in love! This is my new signature spring scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by FORVR. This fragrance is Vanilla heaven! It’s a beautiful scent. It’s very long-lasting. It lasted hours on me. If you are a fan on vanilla scents, give this one a try. It’s worth it every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent! It’s floral and fruity and just makes me feel like summer is here! I love how fresh it smells and it lasts a good while, I spritzed some on my wrists in the morning and could still smell it till after dinner! gifted by forvrmood!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this scent smells. It is fruity and clean. It reminds me of a fruity and vanilla dessert. I also love that it is not super strong, so it is easy to stack sense with it. Overall, love this smell on me and the travel size is easy to use on the go! There is no roller ball just a stick to layer on skin. Gifted by forvrmood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by forvr mood. Although this product was gifted, this is gonna be a completely honest review! When Jackie announced that she was going to be releasing her I was so excited! I am an avid collector of perfumes and was so excited to add her scents to my collection. I received mine about a week ago and I’ve been holding off on making a review because I wanted to fully test its wear time, etc! Right off the bat, I love this fragrance, it has a nice vanilla base with some notes of jasmine. However, as it dries down, it has a sickeningly, sweet, cough syrup scent. The bottle does not seem consistent with Jackie’s luxurious branding that she has built for herself! This bottle seems cheap, and honestly it looked like a perfume that you would buy at Walmart when I first saw it. The font and branding, for this just looks super outdated. For wear time, I was honestly so disappointed. I drowned myself in the perfume… I mean like 10 sprays, at least, and the scent was gone in an hour. For the perfume being almost $80 I’m disappointed that the wear time is equivalent to that of a body spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a delicious scent! It smells like a yummy dessert without being obnoxiously sweet. Picture yourself eating a lemon meringue pie outside on a hot, summer day. That’s what this fragrance gives. I’m not typically a gourmand girl but this one is different- it’s mature, but fun and youthful at the same time! I expect nothing less from Jackie though, she is a perfume girl so she knows what notes work well together. This fragrance works! It’s a great summer time scent. Gifted by forvrmood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect scent for spring/summed. The lemon comes through so nice. Not overpowering. I love the whipped vanilla in this scent. This fragrance is beautiful for everyday use. It’s long lasting on my skin. So happy I was gifted by forvrmood and got to try this beautiful fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this gifted by Forvr Mood. This is a super interesting fragrance and definitely one I want to try layering with others that are similar. This scent is very lemon and vanilla forward. The lemon shines through at first and the dry down is more vanilla on me. Definitely a fun citrus for spring, and it smells lovely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Forvr Mood. This fragrance smells so good. It’s fun, playful yet sophisticated and perfect as an everyday scent or a date night scent. It’s sweet and almost edible. I pick up vanilla, lemon and hints of jasmine.

reviews.review_title: Get this if you want to smell delicious!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Forvr Mood!! I am so happy I was able to try this new perfume. I love love love gourmand scents so when I saw that this was a lemon vanilla scent, I knew I had to try it out! I think it smells absolutely amazing, like a lemon pound cake with vanilla frosting! No alocholic notes that I notice in some sweet fragrances, and no artificial or musky tones either. Just a very nice summery sweet fragrance that makes you smell absolutely edible! Longevity maybe 3-4 hours so I might trying layering it with a lotion to make it last longer! Such a great first fragrance line from forvr mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells AMAZING! Ok wow I am shocked at how much I love the scent. It’s super sweet but also floral, I love it! I am a big fan of sweet dessert type scents and this is just that but with the added notes of refreshing florals. Perfect for spring! Offered by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is beautiful like a diamond. It's a great everyday . The  aroma stays on me for several hours. It’s sweet and citrusy.Definitely recommend who love vanilla and sweet scent. This was gifted by forvrmood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Forvr Mood this travel size of Hard to Get. I do Really enjoy this fragrance as it is light, easy to wear, very vanilla forward with soft lemony touches and a tad candied. It does smell very very similar to D&G Devotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect perfume that smells like a lemon cocktail or a lemon cupcake. Great gourmand for summers, it is refreshing and long lasting. The packaging is so cute too. Highly recommend it for summer gourmand lovers. Gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is downright lovely. Very playful, light & feminine. The whipped vanilla keeps it grounded while the jasmine and lemon make it feel very bright and fun. Not super sweet, but very pleasant and feminine. Absolutely recommend. Gifted by forevrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite perfume hands down! It is the most perfect and versatile scent for any occasion. I promise when you wear this people will not stop asking you what you are wearing and complimenting how good you smell! I received this perfume complimentary from forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this by forvrmood in exchange for my honest review. TBH it was way too sweet of a scent for my preference. Although if you really like super sweet smells this may be for you. It smells like vanilla cupcakes with a hint of lemon. It kind of reminds me of a knock off body spray they sell at the drugstore. The bottle is beautiful & looks really pretty on the shelf and it does last a long time! If you’re into sugary sweet smells then this may be a good option! I wish it had some other notes that made it a bit more luxurious as that’s what I would expect from Jackie Aiana. #giftedbyforvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Forvr Mood is such a unique and fun brand! The bottle is a beautifully unique shape & design. The scent Hard to Get smells exactly like lemon cupcakes! I love everything about this perfume from the packaging, to the bottle and this beautiful scent ! Gifted by Forvr Mood .

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing! I am in love with this fragrance. I am not a fragrance person, but this one is incredible. It smells feminine and sweet but not overly sweet! It’s a perfect everyday scent and is the perfect balance of vanilla and citrus. This was gifted by forevrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this Hard to Get perfume gifted by forvrmood in exchange for my honest review. The scent combination is super unique. On first sniff it hits you with a strong vanilla scent, but the fruity undertones really come through after spraying it onto skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Forvr Mood. This smells amazing and I already know I want to get the full size! I would say this is for more special occasions. If you’re going on a date, this is definitely for the day. I’ve had this on for 15 hours and I still smell it

reviews.review_title: I love the notes of this fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a complimentary from Forvr mood in exchange of my honest review.  The Hard to Get fragrance from Forvr Mood tantalizes with a delightful combination of Citron Zest, Sheer Jasmine, and Whipped Vanilla notes. The citrusy brightness of Citron Zest pairs elegantly with the delicate floral essence of Sheer Jasmine, creating an uplifting and feminine aroma. The addition of Whipped Vanilla adds a creamy, comforting sweetness that rounds out the fragrance beautifully. This captivating blend is perfect for those who appreciate a sophisticated yet playful scent that leaves a lasting impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: YUM. When I wear this I smell like I spent the day baking iced lemon loafs. It is so scrumptious and lingers fairly well, I find I can’t smell it on myself after about 2 hours. The jasmine note brings in an elevated element that differentiates from the sugary perfumes I used when I was younger. I really enjoy this scent and can’t help but sniff a bunch when I wear it. Received complimentary from Forvr Mood

reviews.review_title: THEE scent for Spring and Summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is absolutely amazing. It is so well balanced and delicate. It’s floral and sweet and in my opinion it’s the perfect scent for spring/summer wear. The bottle is luxurious and heavy and spritz’s a beautifully light mist. Im extremely sensitive to perfumes and I sprayed this one at-least 8 times in one go and it did not bother me at all. This perfume was offered by forvrmood in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Exceptional scent, must have for spring
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume captures the feminine floral qualities you love in Jasmine, but with the sweet notes you crave from vanilla and lemon! So refreshing and sweet. I adore this perfume I’ll definitely be getting the full size of this one. It’s a gorgeous scent. This is sweet, approachable, unapologetic. Such an incredible fragrance launch! So happy I got to try this one. 💛🧁🌸✨ “gifted by forvrmood”

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfumes is ideal for day or night, it’s fresh and crispy and flirty! It’s my first time trying a perfume from this brand and I’m super happy with it. I would say it’s more summery perfume. Super worth trying! Gifted by FRVRMD

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells delicious!  It is very, very sweet.  Almost too sweet, but my husband loves it!  Very vanilla and warm.  Very layerable as well.  The staying power is pretty decent.  I could still smell it after five hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Product was kindly gifted by Forvr Mood. I like how this brand is now expanding into fragrances. This is a great direction for it. However, I was not a fan of this scent. The Citron zest is very powerful and a little too fruity for my liking.

reviews.review_title: If you love vanilla scents get this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by forvrmood and I absolutely love how the vanilla is not overwhelmingly warm! Vanilla is my fave scent but I hate the warmth in summer because of the hot weather but this scent is perfect! I think it’s the lemon notes. Smells very sweet and inviting but you can still smell the subtle vanilla notes. The smell is also rich, you should definitely get this if you love vanilla scents and you still want the vanilla smell even when it’s hot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by FORVR MOOD the Hard To Get travel size perfume, and all I have to say is WOW! It smells amazing. It’s very warm, comforting, sweet! The beautiful notes work well together! The warm vanilla makes it so beautiful and unique. I appreciate a travel size perfume with a spray applicator for easy and fast use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my!! This smells absolutely amazing!!! Its a sweet and fruity, almost like a pear smell, but not. Its definitely my favorite purfume right now. I love the bottle and how unique it is. Its so beautiful on my shelf.  *Gifted by Forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited for Jackie to be launching her own collection of fragrances! I was gifted by Forvrmood. I love her and her candles and know she’s a fragrance lover and collector so she knows what smells good together! I am so happy I got Hard to Get first bc it is exactly what I love in a scent. The lemon is like sweet lemon candy as opposed to a more lemon cake vibe, then the jasmine isn’t too strong it just adds balance to it. The lemon actually sticks around for a long time which is hard to get! Usually citrus notes are the first to disappear but I still smell it lightly with the whipped vanilla in the dry down hours later! Are the bottles my favorite? No. I thought she would do something a little more sleek but at this price point, being at Sephora, to reach a wider audience I think Miss Jackie knows exactly what she’s doing! Congrats!

reviews.review_title: A fragrance that is very classy and soft!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is gifted by forvrmood and I am In love with this fragrance already.  It has a scent of vanilla and lemon but I smell the lemon first before I smell the vanilla and it’s not too strong it has this soft and classy feeling, I love that it is not too strong and it gives off this sweet vibe. As a mum I think this is something to use when you have a baby because of how  it is not too strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this was gifted by forvrmood. personally not my fav. it smells very very sweet and almost chocolatey. i usually like sweet vanilla smells but this is not like that. it’s very strong and long lasting so if you do like the scent, at least it will last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Forvr mood. The bottle I just received is very disappointing based on the packaging. It smells good. I was nervous at first But Babbyyyyyy, it literally smells really nice. I will recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is just omg I just can’t get over it , it’s smell is sooo good sooo sweet and super long lasting I just love it and would definitely recommend to everyone…. massive floral bouquet and lemonade at the beginning. Wow. I love sweets. I got it gifted by Forever Mood!  I can't stop smelling it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: “Hard To Get” has notes of whipped vanilla, lemon and jasmine. You can smell every single note but what’s crazy about this blend is you smell something different every single whiff. I’m convinced there is another secret note not mention. It’s sweet, sexy, charming and delightful. The bar has been raised for me! *gifted by forvrmood*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly I am in love with the packaging, it is just so pretty. The fragrance has a strong vanilla scent and it’s very sweet. It also has a hint of jasmine which gives a little floral scent to it. Overall i smell like a lemon candy and the notes are lemon, jasmine and vanilla. I love this fragrance. this is gifted by forvrmood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by forvrmood. this fragrance is light and sweet! it’s fresh with a balance of fruity and floral notes. this wears so well throughout the day, especially if it’s on my clothes as well. i can’t wait to wear this all spring!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing! I got so many compliments on how I smelled! In literally obsessed. It's a summer and spring essential fragrance. I received this fragrance complimentary from Forvr Mood and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so rich & beautiful! I highly recommend trying it out! It smells so nice on the skin and lingers all day and overall smells so delicate and airy and light! Definitely a new favorite. Gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this fragrance gifted by forvrmood. Of course I knew it was going to be top tier coming from the fragrance queen herself. It’s such a beautiful, fresh, jasmine, floral, and vanilla fragrance. I will definitely be wearing it ALL SUMMER LONG.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Forvrmood. I’m really into it, it’s not the usual blend of scents that I gravitate towards but I like the soft and settled sweetness that it has. If I close my eyes I can almost taste a delicious key lime pie with whipped vanilla cream on top that’s not too sweet and not too citrusy. Honestly so lovely! The one thing I would critique is the box that it comes in. Feels very cheap, kind of like the ones you get from knock off perfumes from the flea market. I guess for the price I’m not too mad at it since the bottle, which is plastic, is very beautiful…and the fact that is a diamond shaped inspired by Jackie Aina’s engagement ring, it’s a beautiful personal touch!!! Honestly this is such a pleasant treat to spray on and I’m so happy to add it to my small fragrance collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is gorgeous for this perfume but it is sadly too sweet and gave me a headache! If you like sweet scents this one is for you! However, it is unfortunately not form me :( I know a lot of other people will love it though. Gifted by Forvrmood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for spring! Really excited to see the brand grow. The bottle itself is super cute and I love the way it catches the light. As far as the fragrance, it’s a pleasant experience all around. I’m getting lemon drizzle cake with a floral background and something bubbly. Overall, it’s sweet, bright, and I can see this being worn by different age groups. This is more if a daytime scent that’s fun and flirty. Gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is described as being in the fruity floral family, but it’s much more in the gourmand scent family to my nose. It is very lemon and vanilla - smells like you baked lemon cookies! It has warmth to it and would be a nice summer scent. This was gifted by forvrmood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: All my vanilla lovers, where you at?! This is the scent for you if you love sweet, fresh scents! I’m not a huge fan of vanilla but this one is warm and not too overpowering. The heavy bottle is super luxurious and I can see myself reaching for this one in the colder months! Gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I am so impressed with how fragrant this travel spray is! It is the perfect go-to scent to throw in my bag. It has a fresh floral smell that isn't overpowering but still lasts all day. This is my new signature scent! gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_title: I'll be loving this for years to come!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this scent complimentary from forvrmood & I have to say. - this is a truly perfect warm weather scent! As soon as I gave this a try my nose was filled with citrus and vanilla notes in a way that is definitely sweet but not overly so. I've worn it out a couple of times already and this is definitely a head turner. It's unique, has good throw & seems like one I'll be loving for years to come.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fragrance gifted by forvrmood so much! It feels like a luxury fragrance, and I want to wear it every day! There’s notes of lemon, jasmine, and vanilla! All day, and smells so sweet and delicious! Definitely recommend getting this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the scent of this parfum, it is so sweet which is the one that I am currently looking for . My first time try this brand and it is so impressive , I tried this product and so satisfy with this which makes me want to try more . The scent is so unique, I wore it to work and my coworker likes it too . It also last for long , no need to keep apply on . I recommend this . Received it gifted by forvrmood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume! It’s long lasting and floral and fresh and such a great scent. I am looking forward to trying more scents from the brand. This one is very sweet and fruity and perfect for summer and spring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this smells soo gourmet love lemon smells my absolute favorite smell I have never found one I actually like usually just sprays but this perfect and amazing I def recommend to any lemon lovers I got gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love trying out new perfumes and I was really excited to give this one a try, but the vanilla scent is overly whelming strong and not a good way. I unfortunately really did not like this one. I was gifted by forvrmood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is really good! It’s deliciously sweet and citrusy. It smells like lemons at first and then it dries down to a more sweet vanilla like scent. Not my typical preferred scent but its a great option for spring! I received this product for free Gifted by forvrmood in exchange of my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from FORVR MOOD  I’m really liking this perfume! The scent isn’t too powerful and lasts all day. At first I couldn’t distinguish the individual notes, but after having it on for a while could really smell the vanilla. I definitely see myself continuing to use this but don’t think I would purchase it for myself. It smells good but I feel like I could fine something very similar at a lower price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the FORVR MOOD HARD TO GET EDP perfume, and it was an absolute delight! The combination of citron zest and sheer jasmine creates a bright and energizing aroma, while the whipped vanilla frosting adds a sweet and irresistible touch. It's like wearing a burst of sunshine and sweetness wherever I go. Definitely a new favorite in my fragrance collection! Complimentary from the band.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Forvr Mood Hard to Get perfume is an absolute gem! Its bright, luminous scent captivates from the first spritz, evoking a sense of effortless elegance. With notes that dance gracefully on the skin, it's perfect for any occasion, adding a touch of sophistication to my everyday. I'm utterly smitten with its long-lasting allure. Definitely a must-have in any fragrance collection! gifted by forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the hard to get perfume from forvr mood, it has some hints of vanilla, it has a super soft and sexy touch that I love, I tried it using it and then I took a shower, and I could notice that the aroma continued

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: A must-have addition to any perfume collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The moment I saw the stunning bottle design of Forvr Mood - Hard To Get, I knew it was something extraordinary. Its transparent, diamond-cut appearance exudes elegance and sophistication. Upon spritzing the scent, I was enveloped in a delightful blend of bright lemon zest, delicate jasmine, and comforting vanilla. This combination is both refreshing and inviting, perfect for the upcoming warmer months. The fragrance lingers beautifully, with sweet vanilla and subtle floral notes lingering on my skin throughout the day. It effortlessly transitions from day to night, suitable for any occasion. Forvr Mood - Hard To Get has quickly become a staple in my perfume collection, and I eagerly anticipate enjoying its captivating aroma further. Gifted by ForvrMood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was quite excited to try this new perfume however I feel disappointed. This perfume starts nicely with fresh citrusy notes, however they disappear within seconds and strong sweet vanilla notes take over and that’s about it. I don’t get the jasmine notes at all. Perfume doesn’t develop overt time and it seems quite flat with the strong vanilla which last about 5-6h. If you like strong sweet vanilla perfume this will be for you, but for me it’s quite boring and disappointing. The only big attribute of this perfume is its bottle design, it’s quite pretty, however box did not come wrapped in plastic like typically other perfume do. This perfume was gifted by Forvmood in exchange for my opinion.

reviews.review_title: A must add to your collection

reviews.review_text: I was generously gifted by Forvr mood in exchange for my honest feedback. All opinions are my own. First let me say this is a beautiful bottle! Very unique which I love as I like to display my perfume collection. The first spritz was complex. I smelled vanilla and perhaps a bit of musk but also some type of citrus. After it dried down it left a beautiful strong yet soft, warm vanilla scent. Not gourmand per se. I generally don’t care for warm scents but this is absolutely beautiful! It lasts and lasts too! One or two spritzes is all you need and I promise the next day you’ll still smell it on your body and clothing. However don’t get it twisted, it is not overwhelming, overpowering, or anything else negative. This is a fabulous fragrance and I look forward to try of Forvr Mood’s perfume!

Gifted by forvrmood.
